ideas.title: Flinders Street Frenzy
ideas.premise: A flock of pigeons reads a newspaper headline about the sports team winning and starts celebrating by doing the Mexican wave on Flinders Street Station steps.
ideas.why_funny: Pigeons acting like bogans supporting their team in a very public space.

ideas.title: Bourke Street Expansion
ideas.premise: A tiny local bookshop expands into a mega-store, accidentally merging with a nearby Bunnings, selling 'flatpack literature'.
ideas.why_funny: Compares local business to a big chain; puns on DIY and literature.

ideas.title: Weather Woes
ideas.premise: The weather forecaster confidently announces 'Clear Skies!' while being simultaneously drenched by a rogue downpour.
ideas.why_funny: Ironic twist on Melbourne's famously unpredictable weather.

ideas.title: Infrastructure Inspiration
ideas.premise: City council proposes a new roundabout, but it's just a massive tram circling Federation Square endlessly.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerates the love/hate relationship with Melbourne's trams.

ideas.title: Queen Vic Crowd Control
ideas.premise: The Queen Victoria Market crowd is so large it literally spills over into space, forming a new moon made of hot jam donuts.
ideas.why_funny: Absurdist humor, exaggerating the size of crowds and Melbourne's food scene.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.title: Melbourne sports team advances in regional championship
headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title
